Job Description: Dear Candidate,Please find below JD for the Software Development Engineer role. Interested applicants can share the updated CV on richie.bollamma@teamlease.com Must have 8+ years of experience in Microsoft technologySkills: Asp.net, API, microservice, hadoop\big data, cloud(AWS/Azure) platform, .NetCore, SQL ServerAdditional Skills (Optional):- Node.js, Angular.js and PostgresqlKey Responsibilities :Must have experience in handling team and also should be able to perform as an individual contributorExperience in all phases of SDLC. Strong working exp in a .NET web framework, Experienced in Web Application development using ASP.Net, MVC, C# & .Net CoreAzure/AWS Cloud  Project handling Experience. Typically involving the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) methodology to meet identified business needs ensuring process control (adhering to the organization's laid down processes).Experienced in integrating web applications with Web Service, Web API Experienced in Front End development using Angular 4, Typescript, Reactive forms, jQuery, JavaScript Experienced in data layer development using ADO.Net Experienced in writing TSQL (e.g. Stored Procedure, Functions, etc.) and other database-related development in RDBMS: Microsoft SQL Server Involved in all the phases of SDLC Experienced in RPA, Big data (Hadoop) will be an added advantage.
